page.title: 07Whitley Clubs and Groups
page.content: The first{Women's Institute}in Whitley was formed in l939.The first President was Mrs Roland .It meets on the first Thursday in each month at 7.30 in the Village Hall.There are 87 members and they are interested in: handicrafts, darts, drama, singing, public affairs, bowls,badminton,scrabble,gardening and produce and many other topics,national local and international. The{Art Club} was started by Frank Wright and meets once a week to paint, mainly in water_ colours, in each others houses. The {Chess Club}meets on Tuesday evening in Mr Alms' house. There are 25 members, beginners are taught,the rest progress by playing each other and in matches. The{Friendly Club}is held every other Thursday. The President is Mr W Leigh and the Chairman is Mr H.Morgan. There are 37 members who play cards, bingo and talk and visit places of interest.
